Effect sizes and their CIs for aov objects

Source: R/helpers_effsize_ci.R
aov_effsize.Rd

Effect sizes and their CIs for aov objects

aov_effsize(
  model,
  effsize = "eta",
  partial = TRUE,
  ci = 0.95,
  iterations = 100
)

Examples

# \donttest{
# for reproducibility
set.seed(123)

# model
mod <- stats::lm(formula = wt ~ am * cyl, data = mtcars)

# effect size
statsExpressions:::aov_effsize(mod, effsize = "eta")
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>   term   estimate conf.low conf.high
#>   <chr>     <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 am      0.634      0.377     0.755
#> 2 cyl     0.468      0.182     0.639
#> 3 am:cyl  0.00226    0         0.123
statsExpressions:::aov_effsize(mod, effsize = "eta", partial = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>   term   estimate conf.low conf.high
#>   <chr>     <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 am     0.480      0.298     0.663 
#> 2 cyl    0.243      0.100     0.395 
#> 3 am:cyl 0.000627  -0.0124    0.0254
statsExpressions:::aov_effsize(mod, effsize = "omega")
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>   term   estimate conf.low conf.high
#>   <chr>     <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 am       0.598     0.451     0.784
#> 2 cyl      0.425     0.232     0.672
#> 3 am:cyl  -0.0301   -0.141     0.125
statsExpressions:::aov_effsize(mod, effsize = "omega", partial = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>   term   estimate conf.low conf.high
#>   <chr>     <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 am      0.465      0.362     0.743
#> 2 cyl     0.231      0.173     0.624
#> 3 am:cyl -0.00916   NA         0.117
# }
